org.zkybase.kite.interceptor

Interface GuardListSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationGuardListSource, DefaultGuardListSource

    public interface GuardListSource

    Strategy interface to return the list of guards associated with a given joinpoint. The GuardListInterceptor uses this to determine which guards to apply to the joinpoint.

    One strategy, for example, is the DefaultGuardListSource, which uses a fixed list, usually specified explicitly in the XML configuration. Another strategy, the AnnotationGuardListSource, uses annotations to specify the guards. It's possible to imagine even more dynamic guard list sources, such as a database. The ops team might for instance dynamically create and apply guard lists in a database through a management interface.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Willie Wheeler (willie.wheeler@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Guard> getGuards(Method method, Class<?> targetClass)
      Return the list of guards for a method, or null if the method is unguarded.

    • Method Detail

      • getGuards

        List<Guard> getGuards(Method method,
                    Class<?> targetClass)
        Return the list of guards for a method, or null if the method is unguarded.
        Parameters:
        method - method
        targetClass - target class. May be null, in which case the declaring class of the method must be used.
        Returns:
        the matching guard list, or null if none found
